sections.title: Setup
sections.text:
Download the loader here: https://lewislitt.life/Store/Install.html

Download our support tool here: https://mega.nz/file/ioJQ3TAK#khDxBBZ0_LiX__6zEnfr2N6PG1_HDuv271J5rFus7yQ

Make everything green in the support tool before downloading the loader!

sections.title: Instructions
sections.text:
Disable any anti virus software and disable any running anticheats (faceit, vanguard, etc)

Disable real time protection in windows security as the loader will most likely be automatically deleted by it

Extract the Visual-C-Runtimes.zip and run install_all.bat as admin

Go to https://lewislitt.life/Store/Install.html and enter a key and wait for a custom loader build to be downloaded

sections.title: Loader Account Activation
sections.text:
Launch loader and either login to an existing account or register a new one using a license

Once logged in, head over to the products page and select the product you would like to use and press inject

sections.title: Loader Steel Series Injection
sections.text:
Once the loader is waiting for SteelSeries to be open (download: https://steelseries.com/gg/moments/download). Download and login to SteelSeries

You must then enable SteelSeries moments in order for the overlay to work.
